model Account {
  fields {
    address Text
  }
}

model Post {
  fields {
    size Number
  }
}

===

model Account {
  fields {
    address Text
    posts Post[]
  }
}

model Post {
  fields {
    size Number
	  author Account
  }
}

===

ALTER TABLE "post" ADD COLUMN "author_id" TEXT NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE "post" ADD FOREIGN KEY ("author_id") REFERENCES "account"("id") ON DELETE CASCADE;

=== 


[
  { "Model": "Post", "Field": "authorId", "Type": "ADDED" }
]
